summary: Completed testing of admin login functionality and access control. Admin login works correctly but found critical mixed content security issue affecting API calls.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 403 Forbidden when accessed with valid admin token
critical_bugs.impact: Admin dashboard cannot load incident data

integration_issues.issue: Mixed Content Error: Frontend making HTTP requests to backend while served over HTTPS

security_issues.issue: When accessing /admin without login, user redirected to /dashboard instead of /login

passed_tests: Admin login works with admin/admin123 credentials
Regular user login works with testuser/test123 credentials
Admin user gets redirected to /admin after login
Admin Dashboard renders with correct title (data-testid=admin-dashboard-title)
Admin dashboard tabs are clickable and functional
Invalid credentials are properly rejected with 401 status

success_percentage.frontend: 75% (admin login works, dashboard renders, but API integration fails)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Mixed Content Error - Frontend is making HTTP requests to HTTPS backend. Check API service configuration and ensure all API calls use HTTPS. Also fix admin access control to redirect to /login instead of /dashboard when accessing /admin without authentication.
